nodes.text: Jedi Library is a recurring department of Star Wars Insider magazine. The department takes a newsworthy look at upcoming Star Wars novels.
Star Wars Insider 80: Through the Labyrinth of Evil
An article by Jason Fry about the bridging novel Labyrinth of Evil.
Star Wars Insider 84: Collecting History: Two Books That Delve Into Star Wars Lore
An article by Jason Fry about Star Wars Chronicles: The Prequels and The Star Wars Poster Book.
Star Wars Insider 90: Caught in the Tempest
An article by Jason Fry about the Star Wars: Legacy of the Force novel Legacy of the Force: Tempest.
Star Wars Insider 91: Questions of Allegiance
A preview of the upcoming Timothy Zahn novel Allegiance, released January 2007.
